about_the_game:
Gear up with the seventh track of the Capcom Arcade Stadium: Mini-Album, "Powered Gear - Opening"!

This track is the high-octane opening theme of Powered Gear - Strategic Variant Armor Equipment, one of the titles included in Capcom Arcade Stadium!

Don't miss out on some nostalgic favorites!
